title: An ansvver to the poysonous sedicious paper of Mr. David Jenkins. By H.P. Barrester of Lincolnes Inn.
author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.
publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock dwelling at the signe of the Kings head in Paules Church-yard,
notes: A reply to: Jenkins, David. The vindication of Judge Jenkins prisoner in the Tower, the 29. of Aprill, 1647 (Wing J613).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "arker" inserted after H.P.; "May: 12th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
